member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.PropertyHelper.GetProperties(System.Object)
member.summary: Creates and caches fast property helpers that expose getters for every public get property on the underlying type.
member.param: the instance to extract property accessors for.
member.returns: a cached array of all public property getters from the underlying type of target instance.

member.summary: Creates and caches fast property helpers that expose getters for every public get property on the specified type.
member.param: the type to extract property accessors for.
member.returns: a cached array of all public property getters from the type of target instance.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.PropertyHelper.GetVisibleProperties(System.Object)

summary.para: Creates and caches fast property helpers that expose getters for every non-hidden get property on the specified type.
excludes properties defined on base types that have been hidden by definitions using the new keyword.

member.param: The instance to extract property accessors for.
member.returns: A cached array of all public property getters from the instance's type.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.PropertyHelper.GetVisibleProperties(System.Type)

summary.para: Creates and caches fast property helpers that expose getters for every non-hidden get property on the specified type.
excludes properties defined on base types that have been hidden by definitions using the new keyword.

member.param: The type to extract property accessors for.
member.returns: A cached array of all public property getters from the type.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.PropertyHelper.MakeFastPropertyGetter(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Creates a single fast property getter. The result is not cached.
member.param: propertyInfo to extract the getter for.
member.remarks: This method is more memory efficient than a dynamically compiled lambda, and about the same speed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.PropertyHelper.MakeNullSafeFastPropertyGetter(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Creates a single fast property getter which is safe for a null input object. The result is not cached.
member.param: propertyInfo to extract the getter for.
member.remarks: This method is more memory efficient than a dynamically compiled lambda, and about the same speed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.PropertyHelper.MakeFastPropertySetter(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Creates a single fast property setter for reference types. The result is not cached.
member.param: propertyInfo to extract the setter for.
member.remarks: This method is more memory efficient than a dynamically compiled lambda, and about the same speed. This only works for reference types.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.PropertyHelper.ObjectToDictionary(System.Object)
member.summary:
Given an object, adds each instance property with a public get method as a key and its associated value to a dictionary.
If the object is already an instance, then a copy is returned.
member.remarks: The implementation of PropertyHelper will cache the property accessors per-type. This is faster when the the same type is used multiple times with ObjectToDictionary.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.ViewHierarchyUtility
member.summary: Contains methods to locate _ViewStart.cshtml and _ViewImports.cshtml

member.name: F:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.ViewHierarchyUtility.ViewImportsFileName
member.summary: File name of _ViewImports.cshtml file

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.ViewHierarchyUtility.GetViewStartLocations(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the view start locations that are applicable to the specified path.
member.param: The application relative path of the file to locate _ViewStarts for.
member.returns: A sequence of paths that represent potential view start locations.
member.remarks: This method returns paths starting from the directory of and moves upwards until it hits the application root. e.g. /Views/Home/View.cshtml -> [ /Views/Home/_ViewStart.cshtml, /Views/_ViewStart.cshtml, /_ViewStart.cshtml ]

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.ViewHierarchyUtility.GetViewImportsLocations(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the locations for _ViewImportss that are applicable to the specified path.
member.param: The application relative path of the file to locate _ViewImportss for.
member.returns: A sequence of paths that represent potential _ViewImports locations.
member.remarks: This method returns paths starting from the directory of and moves upwards until it hits the application root. e.g. /Views/Home/View.cshtml -> [ /Views/Home/_ViewImports.cshtml, /Views/_ViewImports.cshtml, /_ViewImports.cshtml ]

member.summary: Gets an ordered of parsed s and file paths for each _ViewImports that is applicable to the page located at . The list is ordered so that the 's for the _ViewImports closest to the in the file system appears first.
member.param: The path of the page to locate inherited chunks for.
member.returns: A of parsed _ViewImports s and their file paths.
member.remarks: The resulting is ordered so that the result for a _ViewImport closest to the application root appears first and the _ViewImport closest to the page appears last i.e. [ /_ViewImport, /Views/_ViewImport, /Views/Home/_ViewImport ]
